data.title: Good Gourmet Sandwiches
data.text: So this is what you expect.  Great friendly service, and better than average sandwiches. My visit was nice, and I recommend this eatery if you're looking for a good lunch or evening meal.

data.title: Good Subs made better with better ingredients
data.text: Always consistent and good, fast, did I say fast.  Better ingredients make better subs and wait staff friendly.

data.title: Jimmy John's Lunch
data.text: The staff is wonderful and very welcoming.  The sandwiches are very fresh. It was nice going into a sandwich shop that makes you feel like a valued customer.

data.title: Not Deserving of the Name Jimmy John's
data.text: I've eaten at Jimmy John's restaurants all over the country, and while the sandwiches are not the best I've ever eaten, they are very good, and Jimmy John's is famous for food delivery, which they do very well.  I'm currently working in Erie, PA, and decided to order a Jimmy John's sandwich and have it delivered to the hotel.  I ordered the Gargantuan sandwich, and when it didn't arrive in 30 minutes, I called the store.  The manager told me they were a bit behind.  When my sandwich finally arrived, it was a tuna sandwich.  I called the store, and the manager promised the right sandwich shortly.  When the sandwich arrived it was incorrect.  Again, I called the store, and was promised a corrected sandwich,  I decided to contact the store again to make sure they made the sandwich correctly, but the man that answered the phone was so rude, that I just cancelled my order.  I know this is not normal behavior for a Jimmy John's restaurant, so in my opinion, this restaurant does not deserve the name Jimmy John's.
